items.sentence: I\'ve lived in Boston a little over three years.
I\'m too old to start learning how to snowboard.
Tom flipped open his cell phone and made a call.
Tom folded the towels and put them on the shelf.
I\'m not afraid to tell Tom about what happened.
I\'m not looking forward to Christmas this year.
Tom said you speak French better than Mary does.
Tom told Mary that he was going to be home late.
Don\'t lose your temper no matter what Tom says.
Don\'t worry about things that may never happen.
Don\'t worry. Things always work out in the end.
It\'s very unlikely that Tom survived the crash.
Tom watched the squirrel jump from tree to tree.
I hear that Tom can speak French quite fluently.
I heard that Tom and Mary have both passed away.
Do you still think that I should go talk to Tom?
Tom received an urgent message to call his wife.
Tom usually eats a bowl of cereal for breakfast.
Tom walked into the bedroom to get some clothes.
Tom kissed Mary goodbye and then got on the bus.
Tom said he didn\'t have many friends in Boston.
Tom said he didn\'t want to go swimming with us.
I want Tom to stay where he is until I get back.
I wanted Tom to buy a birthday present for Mary.
Tom told me that he sleeps with the window open.
It\'s easy to lose your footing on loose gravel.
I don\'t want to discourage you from doing that.
I don\'t want to wait any longer than necessary.
Tom tried to tell Mary that he didn\'t like her.
Tom isn\'t the only one who thinks Mary\'s cute.
I don\'t like it when Tom borrows money from me.
Tom and I ended up becoming really good friends.
Tom and I walk to school together every morning.
We couldn\'t keep up with the rest of the group.
We didn\'t do everything we were supposed to do.
We don\'t believe Tom did what Mary said he did.
We don\'t even know if Tom got to Boston or not.
Why did you agree to do this if you\'re so busy?
Why didn\'t you ride your bicycle to work today?
Tom doesn\'t have to make up his mind right now.
When Tom started dancing, Mary began snickering.
When was the last time you cleaned your kitchen?
Your job is to make sure Tom does his job right.
Tom could\'ve been there, but I didn\'t see him.
Tom could\'ve called the police, but he didn\'t.
If you don\'t plant the seeds, they won\'t grow.
Do you know anyone who would be able to help me?
Do you know anyone who would be able to help us?
Do you know how much I really wanted to do that?
Do you know how much I really wanted to see Tom?
